main.name: Manish Sondhi
main.description: I am a UI/UX Designer at CYNC Software
main.bio: Hi there! I am Manish! I've worked with startup and large corperations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realized my passion as becoming an UI/UX Engineer.

education.description: Graduated with a great learning experience in Information Technology
Certified in Foundations of User Experience (UX) Design from Google

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: Worked closely with product owners to establish requirements and create an AWS-based offering. Responsible for leading Designs for Collateral and Relationship, which enabled lenders to add, maintain, and pledge collateral for loans and guide decision-making for loss given default (LGD) risk ratings. The React.js design framework and style guide were used to maintain uniformity throughout the application. Microsoft Forms was used for user research surveys, and storyboards, user flows, and sitemaps were used to showcase design concepts. Scalable visual user interface elements were created, and high-fidelity wireframes were created using Adobe XD. User interface components like CTAs, layouts, target links, landing pages, and banner ads were rigorously tested.  Also created full stack solutions and continuous delivery frameworks to help financial lending software teams produce faster and higher-quality solutions. Extensive knowledge in developing and maintaining applications using JSX, React.JS, Micro-Frontend, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.JS. Used react-router to convert the application into a Single Page Application, and had expertise with React components, Forms, Events, Keys, and Router.  Involved in all aspects of design, development, and testing daily.

work.title: UI/UX Designer
work.description: Creating rapid prototypes to validate design concepts, leading/facilitating design activities and prototype workshops, talking to users and other stakeholders to gather needs, guiding conversations to develop and validate UI concepts and metaphors, working with front-end UI analysis, user/task analysis, and interviewing, using Adobe XD to build high-fidelity prototypes based on user demands and business objectives, working closely with development teams to make sure designs are technically feasible within authorized frameworks, and supporting the execution of UI concepts and design approaches.

skills.name: Prototyping, Wireframing, User Flows, and Mockups

Quote.text: Work harder than the other person in the room no matter how hard it is get the work done and give everything you have in you toward the work you really love.
I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.
Real programmers can write assembly code in any language.
People ignore design that ignores people.
